name: BEASTWATCH: Meat & Mayhem
description:
Beastwatch is a retro-style horror shooter in which you play a security guard working his first night in a slaughterhouse.

Plunge into an unimaginable macabre nightmare in Beastwatch, a terrifying first-person shooter that immerses you in the heart of darkness. On your first shift as a security guard at a shadowy slaughterhouse, you expected a quiet night, but blood spills, and hidden horrors emerge as the animals take a sinister turn.



KEY FEATURES



  • Immersive Retro Atmosphere: Explore a world of terror thoughtfully designed with retro graphics that transport you to the golden age of horror gaming.

  • Intense First-Person Action: Confront grotesque mutations in thrilling first-person combat as you fight for survival in a slaughterhouse overrun by chaos.

  • Unthinkable Horrors: Face unimaginable abominations that will challenge your sanity and tactical skills around every corner.

  • Tense Exploration: Traverse dark hallways, chilling storerooms, and secret passages as you unravel the story behind the nightmare lurking in the slaughterhouse.

  • Mysteries to Uncover: Discover clues, solve puzzles, and unravel the darkest secrets of the slaughterhouse as you struggle to survive.

  • Claustrophobic Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in an intensely claustrophobic atmosphere where every corner hides a new terror waiting to shred you apart.



Prepare for a visceral horror experience that will test your nerves and wit.

Are you ready to face your first night in the slaughterhouse?
